{{Description|[[Guoba]] loves to eat spicy food. Problem is, his stomach can't handle something this spicy.}}
'''Guoba Attack''' is [[Xiangling]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|particles|each breath|1}}
* After 2s from skill activation, Guoba will breathe fire at opponents every 1.5s, '''4''' times. Guoba exists on-field for a total of 7s.
* After Xiangling gains her first Passive Talent, [[Crossfire]], Guoba's breath attack hits in a 5-meter-long cone in front of him with a diameter of approximately 1.5 meters at max range.
* Unlike [[Explosive Puppet]] and [[Jumpy Dumpty]], this skill can not activate pressure plates.
* Guoba can be picked up by [[Gust Surge]].
* {{TalentNote|character=Xiangling|talent=Guoba Attack|snapshot|Flame DMG}}

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|character=Xiangling|talent=Guoba Attack|ascension|1|Crossfire}}
* {{TalentNote|character=Xiangling|talent=Guoba Attack|ascension|2|Beware, It's Super Hot!}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|1|Crispy Outside, Tender Inside}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|Guoba Mad}}
